content: नाल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [नलस्येदं अण्] Consisting or made of reeds. --लं {@--1@} A hollow stalk, especially the stalk of the lotus; विकचकमलैः स्निग्धवैडूर्यनालैः <ls>Me. 76</ls>; <ls>R. 6. 13</ls>; <ls>Ku. 7. 89.</ls> ({%--<ab>m.</ab>%} also in this sense). {@--2@} Any tubular vessel of the body. {@--3@} Yellow orpiment. {@--4@} A handle. --लः A canal, drain.
